content.rendered: Pasang DVR dari Infinity HDTVI DVR TDV-7308/16-H2SV untuk kebutuhan kamera pengawas. Kamera CCTV Infinity HDTVI DVR TDV-7308/16-H2SV dapat membantu anda dalam menjaga aset di dalam bangunan ataupun luar bangunan. DVR Infinity HDTVI DVR TDV-7308/16-H2SV adalah produkt terbaik karena sudah dibekaliH.264 , H.264+& Dual-stream video compression Features Support  HD-TVI, IPC, AHD and analog cameras with adaptive access Support Cloud storage(One Drive, Google Drive or Drop Box) Simultaneous HDMI/VGA output at up to 4K (3840 × 2160) resolution for HDMI output of Long transmission distance over coax cable Up  to 4/8-ch synchronous playback at 1080p resolution playback at up to 256X speed.
